1.content: So, Who takes the job?
1.title: The New Employee

11.content:
Mary brushed her platinum blonde, completely flat hair out of her face and kissed towards the picture, SNAP!

She looked up at the Agency, and already figured it was going to be a long summer. It was bad enough already that her mom had forced her into a summer job. But, on the bright side, a summer job meant money, hot guys...

She reached into her pocket one last time, and re-applied her Supergloss lipstick. She was raised on the idea that lipstick made the job.

The door opened for her, and Mary strutted into the Agency.

Many of her friends had gotten jobs there at the Agency, but not so many of them talked to her after that. They all said the same thing though; it was the best summer of their lives. Most of them were now semi-famous, and one of them now adorned posters all over Paris. Mary wanted to join them desperately.

Mary met the receptionist at the desk, and with an air of confidence, said, "Here for the summer positions."

The receptionist looked up at her, laughed and rolled her eyes, ushering Mary into the next room. Mary swore the receptionist gave a laugh, "Wonder what this one's gonna be like..."

Mary entered the conference hall...
11.title: A Summer I'm Not Going To Forget

111.content:
"Welcome, Mary! Or, would you rather we refer to you as Miss Longfield?"

Her new boss looked kind of old, at least in his forties. She had to admit, it was disappointing.

"Um, Mary's good by me! Um, I didn't think I'd be meeting my boss this early..."

"What? Boss? Oh, me, I'm just the assistant. Don't worry, happens all the time! The boss is really busy right now, so..."

At that moment the phone went off, and the forty-something cringed. He stalked over towards the phone, and picked it up like it was covered in slime.

"H-hello?"

"GODDAMMIT, WISE!! 7:15, I SAID! 7:15! CAN'T EVEN GET THE GODDAMN TIME RIGHT! I'LL BE COMING DOWN TO THE CONFERENCE HALL NOW, SO YOU BETTER KEEP YOUR ASS THERE!"

Mary shuddered, it was the real boss. Somehow, she had the strangest premonition this job wasn't going to end well... The assistant, whose name must have been 'Wise', desperately motioned for Mary to come back. She pitied the poor guy, and without a sound walked his way. When he saw her meandering over, he smiled and began to explain.

"My boss, and yours in the future, is a little scary at first. His name is Doxon and please remember that. Oh, and do whatever he says; your life could depend upon it. I'm sure you'll see Mr. Doxon as a very fair employer..."

The conference doors slammed open again, and in walked "the boss". He was tall, with jet black hair and beady brown eyes that looked like hellfire. As far as age, Mary thought he didn't look a day over 25, which contrasted highly to his weakly elder assistant. Mary kept it to herself, but despite his imposing get-up, Mr. Doxon was kind of hot. She stood as primly as she could, and tried to look very eager for the job. This could be the thing that rocketed her to the top, if what her friends said was the truth. She wondered if any of them had to face this man before her... She got a little excited.

"Well, well, you even let her in? Good morning, Miss..."

Mary was unsure how to greet him, so she kept her hands to herself at first.

"Longfield, Mary Longfield. It's a pleasure to meet you, Mr. Doxon."

Doxon shot a dirty sneer at his assistant, and then his face completely morphed. He smiled candidly at Mary, and quite frankly it was freaky.

"It's such a nice time when summer rolls around, don't you think? For me, it means fresh, young faces all around the building. I think you'll find this the best summer job you've ever had! Maybe, even, when you get a little older you'll come on back!"

Doxon laughed, and Mary had to stop herself from completely melting. This guy seemed sexier by the minute, but she knew he was 1: her boss, 2: interviewing her for a job, 3: completely and utterly creepy. So, she submissively sat down across from him and Mr. Wise, tentatively twiddling her thumbs under the table.

"As I'm sure, you've never applied her before?"

"No."

"Good, well, the job is basically this. We are a modeling agency, no?"

Mary nodded her head; it was good to hear her old dream.

"Then you, for a special piece, will be modeling for us, and this will run approximately..."

"Three months," Wise stated.

Again, Doxon glared at him, and redirected a happy face to Mary.

"So, you will start tomorrow, and wear baggy clothes, please. The receptionist will meet you on your way out with the schedule. Thank you!"

Doxon and Wise flew out in a hurry, but just before leaving, Wise shot her a solemn glance. It seemed to say, "I'm so sorry." Mary couldn't make sense of it. She walked out of the conference hall, and moved towards the receptionist table. The receptionist looked up at her again.

"Oh, it's you. So, I'm assuming you're hired."

"Yes, ma'am."

"Ma'am? Ha! That's a new one. Here's your schedule, kid. May God be with you."

With that, Mary left the Agency, but not without a confused look on her face. What was all this about? Needless to say, it would really begin tomorrow...
111.title: The Conference

1111.content:
(Okay, here's where it really starts.)

Mary got up the next morning and yawned. It had been an odd day yesterday, and she was glad to wake up in a pleasant, absolutely normal atmosphere! She strolled her way into the bathroom, and on the way caught a glance of the time...

"9:00"

Mary suddenly recalled that schedule she'd been handed the day before... Her hours started at... 9:30! Quickly, Mary bolted through her morning routine, finishing up within 15 minutes! In her hurry, she didn't stop to think about Doxon's specific instructions... "Please wear baggy clothes."

Did Mary subconciously remember? Or did she forget just like she did with the time?
1111.title: A Late Morning

11111.content:
Mary got behind the wheel of her own, beat-up dirty car in the rush to work. She knew it would probably look bad on her reputation to bring such a scummy car to such a high-scale place of business, but right now image wasn't a matter. Suddenly, Doxon's instructions returned to her.

"Please wear baggy clothes."

She almost flipped out, thinking she would be late and improperly dressed, but took a quick peek down and noticed she'd subconciously worn a nice and baggy outfit. Not to mention it still looked cute! Mary smiled to herself; it was going to be a wonderful day. That was before her car broke down.

Mary welled up with tears and sweat as she finally crossed the block to get to the building. Her sobs became flowing rivers as she found out she was not only late, she was late by half an hour. The receptionist gave a once-over of Mary, and offered her a tissue. She graciously pointed Mary in the direction of the conference hall. Mary, about to bash her face against the door, was rescued by Wise, who also pitied her and ushered her inside.

She looked around the long hall, which was strangely devoid. Why would they rent out such a big room for only one meeting? Mary looked ahead, and saw Doxon waiting for her at a table in the dead center of the room. Without a sound, she sat down. Doxon smiled.

"Glad you could make it on time."

Mary flushed, and her words poured out faster than she could say.

"Omigosh, I'm so sorry! I woke up late, and my car broke down, and I..."

"Sh-sh-shush!"

Doxon continued to grin at Mary, and put a finger to her lips. Mary's color turned a deeper shade of red.

"You're on time. Don't worry. I'm here to take you up to where you'll be starting for today."

Doxon stood up, and began to walk off towards a door at the end of the hall. He stopped, twirled around, and cocked a gesturing finger, telling Mary, 'Come on.' She followed like a lost puppy, and they both exited through the door. From there, they boarded an elevator, riding all the way up to floor 20. Mary clung a bit to Doxon's sleeve; she was afraid of heights a little bit. He didn't snub her off, but merely smirked. 'He looks sexy when he smirks,' Mary thought.

At last on floor 20, Doxon corralled Mary over to a desk counter, where an older looking Chinese woman sat.

"Norma?"

The woman gazed up, and smiled to see Doxon. She then averted her gaze to Mary, whereas her smile became a toothy grin. Mary thought it looked a little too friendly, and shivered a bit. Doxon strung his arm around her shoulder, which calmed her nerves a lot. The woman listened intently to Doxon's words. Mary became lost in him holding her, and thus didn't overhear the words, "Prepare the procedure." All of the sudden, Doxon's arm disappeared, and Mary snapped awake. He waved goodbye to Mary, and re-entered the elevator. Now, it was just Mary and the woman.

"Your name is Mary, right? I'm Dr. Chin, but you can call me Norma. They all do."

Norma continued to beam at Mary - just like a vampire. Mary was afraid to shake her hand. Norma began to laugh, and then drove Mary into a room that looked completely white.

"Here's where new employees get a quick touch-up job before their first shoot. It's a neutralizer, very good for your skin."

Mary instinctively rubbed her cheek, which caused Norma's frightening smile to grow wider. Without haste, Norma guided Mary into a chair on the other end of the room. Norma then entered the control room.

"Please lean back as far as you can in the chair, and close your eyes. The process will be over sooner than you know it."

Despite her every instinct to get out of this creepy as hell room, Mary stayed put, and faithfully followed the instructions. She lulled off to sleep...

Back in the control room, Norma handled a tiny panel of buttons and levers. All that waited for her was to press the button...
11111.title: Fooled By A Smile

111111.content: Decide now: is Mary going to transform quickly or slowly?
111111.title: Before We Go Any Further...

1111111.content:
Norma pressed down the button, and fiddled with a few of the options. Last of all, she moved the little lever for time to "Fast". It had been Doxon's specific instructions, anyways, to incite the transformation as snappy as possible. So, the process had lost its subtle charm - why Norma enjoyed it in the first place. Regardless, the boss was the boss, and his orders came first.

"Her name's Mary, huh? God save her, then."

Norma walked out of the room; she wouldn't be needed any further. Mary had already been tranq'd, so she wouldn't be waking up anytime soon. It would be another normal day...

Mary could vaguely sense what was happening around her. Vivid dreams, full of beauty, happiness, and Mr. Doxon swirled in head, lulling her away from her senses. Unfortunately, those senses were the only things that could have warned her of what was to come...

It was Mary's legs that took the first wave of the transformations. They grew longer and longer, until they splayed out carelessly under Mary. It moved up from there, as Mary's body became older and rounder. Trapped in a drug-induced sleep, Mary couldn't notice herself growing faster and faster into a young woman. When at last the changes stopped, Mary was a beautifully formed woman in her mid twenties. When Norma re-entered the room, Mary couldn't even stand up on her own. Norma sighed, and got a few of her workers to help hoist Mary out. All of this occured while Mary was unconcious.

The workers descended down 14 flights, and stopped on floor 6. They rolled her onto one of the empty beds, and so Mary slept...
1111111.title: Was This in the Job Description?

11111111.content:
While Mary slept soundly as a baby, Doxon crept into the room. The trademark smirk broke out on his face, and with a swift gesture he turned on the lights. Mary stirred instantly.

"Well, Mary, Mary, what do we have here?"

He sat opposite her side of the bed, and lifted her up. Under the remnants of her dazy stupor, Mary couldn't hardly think straight. Doxon looked her straight in the eyes, and Mary's breath shortened.

"You're perfect, Mary. Perfect for me."

He strung out her arms, as Mary had to gasp for air!

"I brought you here for a very special piece; can you guess what it is?"

Doxon now whispered in her ear - Mary sat panting- and he held her close.

"You're going to be my girlfriend."

He kissed the side of her head; Mary passed out. With a sigh, Doxon readjusted her position on the bed and dimmed the lights again. He was just about to leave, when he gave another glance back at her. Smiling, he offered one last remark.

"I'll come back tonight, please be ready."

Mary nodded, and then returned to sleep. Doxon quietly exited the room...
11111111.title: The Boss's Agenda

111111111.content:
A few hours after Doxon had made his presence known, Mary awoke again. She found now the lights up, and two outfits sitting before her. One read "For Tonight"; the other "For Tomorrow". Mary marveled at the beauty of them! A model must have worn these, or at least now she would! Carrying a smile brighter than sunshine, Mary donned her first evening gown.

Thoughts began to flow into Mary's head as she pulled up the dress. Had Doxon been planning this all along? If so, then he'd hired her to be his girlfriend?

Mary stumbled backwards. Trying to put on a dress and uncover her boss's inner workings: two jobs that didn't fit together. So, Mary accomplished the more pressing of the duo: her dress. Once she'd slipped into the dress, a letter fell out from behind the garment bag. It read,

"Dear Mary,

Yes, I knew from the start you were going to be my girlfriend. And yes, that's why I hired you. If you don't hurry up, you'll be late! I'll meet you downstairs in the lobby after you're finished.

Doxon

P.S. The jewelry should be in the box, check it!"

And so she did. Displayed like any old jeweler would. Mary carefully handled the probably priceless earrings of (pure?) silver. Mary caught a glimpse of herself in the mirror, and couldn't look away.

"I look like some sort of princess."

"You do."

Standing in the doorway was Mr. Wise, who had a tear to his eye. Mary, in confusion, came up to the old man. Had he known, too?

"Mr. Wise? Was this supposed to happen?"

He nodded his head.

"Mr. Doxon is waiting in the lobby, and I'm sure you don't want to be late."

Wise showed her the way to the elevator, and from there left Mary. The whole time he'd had his hand to his eyes, wiping away falling tears. One look, and Wise set off reservedly crying. Mary tried to make sense of the gesture... She gasped!

"Could it be... Mr. Wise is...?"
111111111.title: Mary's Real Job

choices: She was a little bit taller
1111112.content:
Norma pressed down the button, and fiddled with a few of the options. Last of all, she moved the little lever for time to "Slow"- Doxon's orders. She didn't mind; she reveled in watching day by day the subtle changes to her test subjects. Doxon had been kind enough to allow her humble machine to work its magic on all of his new employees. He didn't care what else she did with it. With love, she she stroked the shining panel again.

"Her name's Mary, huh? God save her, then."

Norma gave out a minor chuckle, and walked out of the room. Mary was probably "under" thanks to Norma's special batch of tranquilizers. Right now, Mary couldn't be any happier than a monkey in a barrel of bananas. It was going to be an interesting term for Mary...

Since the changes were all too subtle, Mary couldn't notice a hint of them. Not that she would, anyways. Her mind was flying through a dream world filled with a beautiful version of herself, and of course Doxon. Time passed so slowly in the dream world, she didn't know hours had already flown by...

Next thing she knew, she was back home. How had she gotten back so fast? Ah, it was no matter! Mary rolled back into bed, and slept again...

When she woke up the next morning, something was strange.
1111112.title: I Didn't Feel A Thing...

11111121.content:
Mary bumped her head on the shelf next to her bed, for the first time ever! She'd never even been close to getting that high before, but now the shelf had told her she was more than tall enough. A sudden growth spurt, her being still a teenager and all, wasn't too out of place, but how late it was made it peculiar. Mary shrugged it off, and got dressed for the morning.

She was a little embarassed now that her favorite skirt now had become a mini. However, she hoped it would make a nice impression on her boss to see her completely fit for the job because she was taller! For now, Mary ignored the miniskirt; with luck, no one would notice.

After Mary locked the front door to leave the house, she ambled clumsily over to her car in an attempt not to rip the miniskirt. Once she reached it, Mary was shocked to find...
11111121.title: Going Up!

111111211.content:
Mary was about to pound her fist into the car, only then realizing it would tally up more damage. Thank God her mother had paid out for car insurance. She slowly realized she was going to have to pay Mom back the damages with her summer job money... Finally, Mary understood her mother's plan!

About ready to punch out her mom's lights, Mary only then noticed the sound of a revving engine behind her. And lo and behold, it was Doxon! Her boss!

"Sorry about what happened to your car! I'm assuming you're going to need a lift?"

Mary knew there was a god then, if she hadn't before. Eagerly she jumped into the passenger seat, and they took off.

"Nice skirt. Did it fit you when you were five?"

He laughed, and Mary chuckled a little too. She was trapped under the spell of him again.

"No, but really, it's nice and all; I'm just thinking you should consider something a little more fitting."

He then leaned his head back, and Mary followed the hint to find a luxurious new dress waiting for her.

"Company orders."

Doxon smiled at her again, and Mary nodded her head with gusto! This easily was the best day ever!

The two drove off for the Agency...
111111211.title: Need A Lift?

choices: I'm taking you to the shoot myself.
1111112111.content:
"So, how was your first day?"

"Huh?"

Mary returned from her convertible daze, and realized Doxon was talking to her.

"Your first day? Everything went alright?"

"Oh, yes, quite!"

"Hmm, that's good. I'm glad, Mary."

She thought about it now; had she really done any work at all during her first day? Only vague memories surfaced from the day before. Mary remembered the smiling "doctor" Norma, the room... Room? What had happened in that room? She couldn't remember a single thing about it... And after that, she was home, and slept again... Yeah, that's right, she'd slept during the day... Gosh, what had happened? Why couldn't she recall any of it?

"Something on your mind, Mary?"

"Yeah, yesterday. It felt like a breeze..."

"That's understandable; the first day always feels so fast."

"And not just fast, I mean... I can't remember it."

"Remember it? Perhaps there was nothing to remember..."

"That could be the case..."

"You mean, of course it is."

Somehow, Mary got a control freak vibe from the way Doxon imposed his last remark. He struck her as the type to shut her trap around, especially about the memory lapse. Perhaps, he could even be involved? Yes, that made perfect sense. She gave him another once-over; despite his sexy exterior, he was a snake! But wait! Why was she making all these accusations now? She must have left one of those crime dramas on last night, and it lapsed over into her waking thoughts.

"Hey... I just realized something," Mary said.

"What is it?"

"You... already knew my car was trashed."

"Yes, wasn't it obvious?"

"My car was in my garage; I was standing out in front of the closed door. You... did that, didn't you?"

"..."

His grin was ill-placed, and he turned with that sickening smile.

"Sorry, it's true. I had them wreck your car so I could pick you up. Don't worry about the cost, you're covered by us and a replacement is en route."

"You're... a pretty smooth operator, Mr. Doxon."

He proudly chuckled.

"I know."

Mary curled her fingers around her thighs.

"So, why did you pick me up? It surely wasn't because..."

"Well, actually..."
1111112111.title: A Smooth Operator

111111212.content:
Mary completely examined the car, which was beautiful and astonishingly gorgeous. She picked up a little note in the compartment, which read, "A Token of our Thanks, the Agency."

She almost pinched herself, to make sure she wasn't dreaming! It was almost the best day ever! She felt like jumping around like the people who win the lottery, but it seemed a little too stupid for the occasion. Needless to say, Mary jumped in her souped-up car, and sped off towards the Agency.

When she got there, she didn't even need to ask the receptionist where to go anymore. It seems she'd already guessed at Mary's arrival, and pointed her finger towards the conference hall, as usual. Wise met her up in the hall. He was aghast!

"What is that... thing?"

He grimaced at the miniskirt, and Mary flushed.

"It's a... skirt."

"Well, why in the world are you wearing it so high?"

Mary knew it would come out sooner or later, so she motioned to her head to show Wise. His jaw dropped for half a second, and then he regained his composure.

"I see, well... For some reason, Mr. Doxon has told me to give you this dress. He says it's something for company policy."

Wise handed Mary the most beautiful dress she'd ever seen before! She muffled herself before she squealed with delight, and wore it with pride. Wise easily took away the miniskirt, assuring her she'd get it back at the end of the day... Maybe.

Mary entered the conference room.
111111212.title: A Token of Our Thanks

choices: The car was smashed up! How did that happen?
Her car was perfectly clean, and had a new red paint job...
11111122.content:
Mary didn't suspect anything at first when she woke up, only a very odd feeling about herself. It was when she tried to put on her bra later in the morning she first noticed it. Somehow, overnight, she had begun to burst with womanly charm, and had easily outgrown her former A by a size or two. She felt kind of embarassed that it would happen so suddenly, and it made wearing a shirt incredibly uncomfortable. Even the biggest T-shirt she had clung to her like metal to a magnet, and she walked around in complete nervousness that any minute now, her shirt was going to rip. Just for security, Mary wore her brother's large zipper-up hoodie, should the worst case scenario happen.

Mary muttered a small, "What can you do?" and headed out for her car. But when she got there...
11111122.title: The Unexpected "Gift"

111111221.content:
Mary was about to pound her fist into the car, only then realizing it would tally up more damage. Thank God her mother had paid out for car insurance. She slowly realized she was going to have to pay Mom back the damages with her summer job money...

But now was not the time to worry about that, now was the time to get to work to get the money! She considered her options, and right now the bus route was looking the best. Pure dumb luck managed to get her the schedule, as her mother had often chided Mary to try the bus, too. The car had been Mary's response.

So, by the time 8:45 rolled around, the bus stopped and picked up Mary. She'd figured with such an early time, she could pick up breakfast and then come in for work.

Mary boarded the bus, eager to get to work...
111111221.title: I've Never Ridden the Bus!

choices: Wise?? Or at least it looked like him.
1111112211.content:
Mary sat in between two guys, neither of them she could distinguish because they were both looking away. It had been the only seat left, and she was not going to stand in some crummy old bus! So, she took the stupid move: the seat. Needless to say, it wasn't long before one of those guys started to pay attention to Mary, in the exact wrong way. The jacket hadn't necessarily hid her new body from sight, only further suggested it. Naturally, the guy was interested.

"Hey, little girl. Your first time on the bus?"

Her every instinct told her to just ignore the guy, he might get tired of her. The rest of her experience, mainly spawning from watching Cops, told her to get off the bus... NOW. But, the next stop wasn't for a couple of miles, and it would be downright idiotic to ask anymore of the driver than his job.

"Little girl, I'm talking to you! You don't look like you've been taught many manners..."

"Neither do you."

Mary swiveled towards the other man sitting next to her, who had just made the last remark. Something about him seemed kind of fishy, too, but right now he was focusing intently on the newspaper. That same newspaper obscured him from view. Unfortunately for Mary, the other guy was still trying to take advantage of her - no heed for the newspaper man's words.

"So, as I was saying, when someone says hi to you, little girl..."

Suddenly, Mary had her hands pinned up against the seat- the man's cold, ogre-like eyes peered straight into hers, no matter how she looked away.

"You say hello, too!"

At that, the man made a pass on her, briskly unzipping the jacket. Mary wanted to holler, but his intense gaze trapped her! Could no one see what was going on! Her eyes darted around the other passengers, who were taking absolutely no heed.

"I thought I told you to mind your manners, sir."

The man next to her whapped Mary's attacker with the newspaper he'd been carrying, which made the other man very angry. He lunged at the newspaper man, who then struck him with his fist, and the attacker was unconcious. At that, the bus driver finally stopped the bus.

"What's going on back there?"

"Well, sir, this man on the ground here tried to attack this young lady next to me."

"Oh, thank you sir! That's the perp!"

Out of nowhere, seven of the passengers turned around and one pulled out a pair of handcuffs. The driver walked up to the newspaper man, and shook his hand. He and the others were really cops!

"We've been trying to catch this bastard for weeks now! Thanks to you, we finally got him! The police force offers you our humblest gratitude."

With that, the cop tipped his hat, and the officers left the bus, where another bus driver came on: the real one.

Again, Mary glimpsed up at her savior. There was something very familiar about him, it was...
1111112211.title: Now I Know Why...

11111122111.content:
Was it really Wise?? Or could it be someone else? Mary didn't know, she was kind of worried...

"Mr. Wise? It's me, Mary!"

The mystery man looked at Mary, and suddenly tensed up.

"M-Mary?"

When Mary finally got a good look at his face, she confirmed the identity.
11111122111.title: Wise??

111111221111.content:
The man, who was not Wise, chuckled at her in a funny, nervous way. He resembled Wise distantly...

"Oh, heh heh."

"I'm sorry, I confused you for someone I work with..."

"Mr. Wise? He's my uncle, actually!"

Mary was astonished! Already she'd run into someone related to the job!

"I'm Quinton Albert Wise the IV, the Mr. Wise you speak of is my uncle in America. We're distantly related to English royalty, you see, and I've come to visit him now that I've turned 18! And, I was in such a rush from the airport that I took the first bus I saw..."

This foreign nephew didn't seem like the same person from seconds ago when he'd saved Mary. He, once completely cool and confident, now lacked the ability to keep himself together in front of Mary. She wondered how he'd had the sudden change of heart...

"And well, here we are! Tell me, is uncle still in charge of that little company that makes, oh, what are they, curtains?"

Mary looked astonished. She didn't exactly know how to break the news to the poor English gentleman, but she tried her best.

"Actually, Mr. Wise is an assistant... To my boss, at a modeling agency."

The poor nephew looked appalled to hear such words!

"Oh my! I wonder what might have happened!"

"Me, too."

Well, for the rest of the bus ride, Quinton (the nephew) kept chatting away about Mr. Wise, and his family in England, and the curtain company: everything he knew about his uncle. Mary was a tad excited to learn more about him, but she became extremely curious. How had Mr. Wise come to work for a man like Mr. Doxon, at least 20 years his younger?
111111221111.title: The Assistant's Nephew

1111112211111.content:
Before Mary knew it, the bus stopped in front of the Agency. She turned to the nephew.

"Um, I'm going to work right now. There's a chance I can get you with your uncle inside. Then maybe you can sort this all out..."

"Thank you kindly, Miss... I don't seem to remember your name, sorry."

"Mary, Mary Longfield."

"Oh, well, thank you Mary."

The two of them exited the bus and walked towards that towering building. With the push of the door, Mary had already run into...
1111112211111.title: A Kind Offer

choices: What are you doing here, Mary?
I'm probably not the guy you're looking for.
11111122112.content:
Mary gave the guy another once-over, and was almost dead certain it was Mr. Doxon, her boss. But what was he doing on such a ratty bus?

"Mr. Doxon? It's me, Mary, your new employee."

The mystery man looked at her, and then averted his gaze immediately.

"My name is Doxon, but..."
11111122112.title: Doxon??

111111221122.content:
"I'm probably not the guy you're looking for."

Mary gave him a confused look, and the man finally made eye contact with her.

He looked a lot like Doxon, but his hair was a bit longer, and he was wearing sunglasses.His eyes looked a lot less "harsh" than Doxon's. He also wore an all black ensemble, complete with a turtleneck sweater. While it was completely ridiculous, it also made him extremely hot. (No pun intended)

"Y'see, I'm his twin brother. I've just come into town, like I do every couple of months, to visit him and check up on the biz. It's kind of ironic that we should be going to the same place...
Well, since you've sort of figured it out anyways, hi, I'm Vincent Doxon."

"I'm Mary Longfield."

Vincent shook her hand and smiled, in a much more friendly way than her boss, the other Doxon. Mary sat next to him super embarassed, and an awkward silence cooled over the two. Vincent was first to break it.

"So... summer job?"

"Yep."

Vincent's eyes cast downward towards his feet again, and shifted up to her every so often.

"How long?"

"Oh, just a day..."

"A day?"

Vincent's eyes looked worried, and he shot a nervous glance Mary's way. Something was a little off about him after that, he groaned in some sort of minute agony. Mary became extremely confused.

"Umm, something wrong?"

"Oh?"

He looked at her again, the look of anguish completely disappated from his face.

"Sorry, I just remembered something important. Forgive me if I come off a little weird. I think this is our stop, Ms. Longfield."

"Mary."

He gulped. "Mary."

The two exited the bus together, and walked just as awkwardly towards the Agency. His hands melted into his pockets, hers into the jacket.

"So, how old are you anyways, um, Vincent?"

He didn't look over, but still replied.

"26."

That meant her boss was not even thirty yet! And neither was Vincent... Mary's thoughts swam around the idea of two hot men in her life - twins, at that!

"And you?"

Mary stumbled a bit; should she tell Vincent how old she really is? God, the age difference would kill her!

"I'm..."
111111221122.title: Splitting Images, Or Are They?

1111112211221.content:
"I'm 17."

Vincent darted his eyes towards Mary again, completely flabbergasted at her comment.

"Wow! I mean, I didn't expect it. To me, you could at least pass for a college student..."

Mary's head sunk; he'd thought she was a college student! That was a little closer to his age than a measly 17 years old... He was nearly 10 years older, she warned herself.

"Sorry if I've offended you."

He wore an expression of perplexion and humility. Mary lifted her head again - just seeing him with such a pitiful face brought her to try and lighten the mood.

"It's really okay, I mean, I'm only here for a summer job, after all."

Vincent again looked sceptically at Mary, more analyzing than cheerful. She waved her hand in front of his face to break the stare; they'd stopped in front of the building.

"Well, I have to go inside for work, and you're coming too, I think?"

He shook a bit, and then focused again, with a 'shrugging-it-off' laugh.

"Yeah, yeah! I mean, of course..."

Mary and Vincent both walked inside the building, where they encountered...
1111112211221.title: Honesty is the Best Policy... Most of the Time

11111122112211.content:
Doxon, the boss, encountered them with a friendly smirk.

"Well, well, what do we have here? Brother, it's been a while."

Under his breath, Vincent muttered, "Damn right it has..."

"And Mary! I didn't expect you to come along with him!"

"We sort of met on the bus, Robert."

Mary looked between the two guys, glaring like a pair of rams. She felt awkward, as if they were fighting over her...

"Well, Vincent, I will meet you in the conference room in a minute. Miss Mary here has to meet with me right now. If you'll be patient..."

"Robert..."
11111122112211.title: Doxon vs Doxon

choices: "Mary, can I speak with you a moment?"
"The office is down this way, please wait there..."
111111221122111.content:
"This is wrong, Robert!"

"Why, brother, what [i]are[/i] you talking about?"

Doxon coiled his free arm around Mary's shoulder. She shivered at the touch, which at first she had so wanted. Now, he felt like a cold-blooded snake...

"Robert..."

Vincent made an exaggerate gesture in Mary's direction; she froze. What was going on here?!

"Mary, stay right here. [i]My brother[/i] is being a little 'standoff-ish'. I'lll call Wise down to get you."

With that, the duo entered the conference hall Mary knew too well. She figured the both of them about ready to fist fight! Vincent's eyes sparkled with the flame of anger; Doxon's, similarly. It was all she could do to stand in the hall, and wait...

When voices raised in the room over, Mary couldn't stand it any longer! Something fishy was afoot, and she wouldn't be the one to miss out on it! Careful to not make a sound, Mary crept up to the door and listened close...

"Robert, it's all the same to you! Can't you see the aftermath of your reckless behavior?"

"I don't see it as [i]reckless[/i]. It's all good business, brother. Didn't our free-thinking mother teach you that?"

"You leave mother OUT OF THIS!"

Mary slammed to the ground as Vincent's fist pounded the area right above her head! Phew, was that close! Her fears grew and grew now! What really was happening?!

"Mary?"

She looked into the familiar eyes of Mr. Wise, who escorted her off the floor and up the elevator. With each passing minute, Mary's thoughts drove deeper and deeper into Vincent's words...

"[i]This is wrong, Robert...[/i]

[i]Can't you see the aftermath of your reckless behavior?[/i]

[i]Mary...[/i]"

Suddenly, the elevator halted! Wise looked at her curiously, and Mary realized she'd been standing there for a while. In attempt to shrug it off, she raised her head, relaxed her shoulders, and walked on. Wise gave her another strange look, then said...
111111221122111.title: Confrontation in the Conference Hall

11111122112212.content:
As they entered the building they encountered Mr. Wise.

"Mary, so good to see you again. I see the process is coming along nicely."

"Process...what process?" Mary asked, perplexed.

"The one we started yesterday to transform you into a model silly girl. Now if you'll just follow me," he replied, anxious to get going.

"If you insist," she replied, as Vincent told her farewell, and headed toward the elevators.

Mary followed Wise to a room with strange looking chairs where women of various ages sat with what looked like large, salon style, hairdryer things pulled

down over their heads.

"This machine will fill you with everything it would take months or years to teach you about being a model," Wise said as he gestured toward the large silver cushioned chair.

Mary sat down with a whoosh of the cushion, and then the device was lowered down over her head.

"This won't hurt will it? Mary asked nervously.

"You won't even notice a thing," he replied,"Before you know it, you'll be out and then someone will come and get you for the next phase."

So, Mary sat there and soon found herself in a deep slumber.

She awoke to a woman shaking her.

"Ma'am...ma'am wake up," she said,"It is time to get you dressed for your session."

"Alright...wait, did you just call me ma'am? I'm only 17 years old...aren't I? And, why are things sort of blurry? And my...my voice...what is happening to me?"
11111122112212.title: Mr. Wise and speed training

111111221122121.content: Do you want to reconsider that last option, or do you like this path?
111111221122121.title: Hold up!!

1111112211221211.content:
Mary's eyes fluttered, and she stood back in the entrance hall. Vincent looked back at her with confused eyes, and called for her to come on.

Ah! It had been a completely creepy daydream, that's all! But somehow it scared her all the more... Wise had referred to her transforming into a model! Was she really transforming? This morning's sudden growth could have been a sign... No, it couldn't be! She was still seventeen... It could happen.

Seventeen sounded like a dream now. Vincent himself had assured her that. By now, she already resembled a college student! What made her think she was even seventeen??

Afraid of daydreaming again, she hurried up with Vincent to the receptionist's desk. The secretary smiled candidly at Vincent, and put out a call to the top floor. Doxon's office, probably. Mary hadn't seen it herself...

"Oh, Mary? You're wanted on the 18th floor."

Her mind registered that last note. 18 floors, huh? Good thing she wasn't afraid of heights; oh, wait! Walking very slowly towards the elevator, she suddenly caught the hint of footsteps behind her.

"Don't worry, Mary. Just look at the doors on the inside. It's always helped me."

She turned to see Vincent still behind her, and smiled nervously. Going up, alone, with Vincent. Her shivers weren't just brought on by the height now...
1111112211221211.title: Daydreaming Again...

11111122112212111.content:
Both of them walked into the small chamber. Fumbling to press the buttons, they accidentally collided! Vincent slammed against the wall, and Mary flustered to help him. He scratched his head, shrugged it off, and the ride continued...

Mary felt like an idiot. Now look what you've done, she thought.

"Mary, it's okay. Don't bother yourself about it."

"Wha-? How did you-?"

"Um, well... Don't take this the wrong way; I can read people."

"Read people?"

Vincent went on to explain how he majored in psychology. He worked in a different sort of profession, a sort of business psychic. Mary felt a little confused, but tried to understand him. It at least managed to keep her mind off of his attractiveness...

The doors opened again, on the...
11111122112212111.title: An Awkward Elevator Ride

111111221122121112.content:
Was it the top floor, meaning Mary had been too distracted?

Or was it another floor, with another person?
111111221122121112.title: Surprise, Surprise

choices: He wanted to take her with him. (To see Doxon, of course.)
1111112211221211121.content:
By the end of their conversation, Mary realized she'd skipped her floor!

"Oh, crap!"

She frantically tried to press the eighteenth floor button, but Vincent stopped her.

(Was it because...)
1111112211221211121.title: Distractions in His Smile

11111122112212111211.content:
"Mary, wait!"

But it was too late. Now Vincent had missed his floor, too!

"Oh, gosh I'm sorry! I... I forgot!"

"No, it's really fine."

Vincent couldn't get angry at her for anything. Mary wondered what could make this imposing character, who read people, saved girls on buses, and stood quite tall, so docile. She lost herself again in thought. Alas, he looked at her from time to time as they rode down. She couldn't even look up to see his expression of fear...

The doors opened for the eighteenth floor, and Mary stepped out. Vincent followed her.

"I'm only going to see to it you don't make any more mistakes on your way!"

Mary chuckled with him, but almost squirmed with embarassment! Now he'd probably remember her as the unfortunate, floundering Mary! She took a walk of solitude while looking for her place.

"Ah, there you are!"

Lo and behold, before her stood...
11111122112212111211.title: Blundering Mary

1111112211221211122.content: Lastly, who is the one that joins the cast?
1111112211221211122.title: 12th Floor, Going Up!

11111122112212111222.content:
Who is it; Dinah or Petrov?

Dinah Harveyis a model whom Mary idolizes. She's currently the big "it" in the world of youth fashion. Has a big ego. Doesn't know it, but she's being transformed from the Agency's purposes as well.

Petrov Aliomensk is another big agent, like Doxon, in a foreign branch of the Agency. Petrov doesn't believe in the program Doxon has installed (the "transformations") and believes in the purity of the modeling art. He's come to speak with Doxon on this matter. Has an eye for natural beauty, and can spot a fake a mile away.

Of course, those two were very spoiler-iffic character profiles, but you were going to find out anyhow! So, who will it be?
11111122112212111222.title: The New Character

choices: Go back to the real path!
111111221122122.content: Do you like where this path is going, or do you want to get back to the real story?
111111221122122.title: HOLD UP!!!

choices: Mary gets typical middle aged clothes
Mary gets a wild and sexy outfit for someone much younger
1111112211221221.content:
The woman shaking Mary laughed.

"Oh ma'am, you are just a laugh. You're a middle aged woman now...though you are correct, you were 17 before."

"How..." she stammered,"...how could this..."

"...have happened," she replied as she brushed a blond curl out of her face.'I suppose you didn't read the fine print."

"No, why?"

"Well sweetie," the 30 something secretary replied as she helped Mary out of the chair," you probably only saw the salary and that we needed young women for modeling."

"Yes...yes I did..but I'm not sure..."

"Yeah, no one is," she laughed as she escorted Mary to another room with lots of clothes and mirrors."Young people in their late teens and twenties are perfect, since they

are flexible. You agreed to model, and we need different types of models on different days. Once we download the model info into you

you get to do any female type modeling or commercials we need you for."

"So that means I have to be old?"

"Well, for now yes but that can change. And believe me, this is middle aged. You have yet to see old."

"But...how am I going to explain..."

"...to your friends?" the assistant inquired as she proceeded to pick out clothes for Mary."Your friends will react to the new you as if this is how you have been all along,

and the effects fade over time--usually in a few hours after you get home. But, you signed the contract and agreed to the side effects."

"Side effects?" she gasped.

"All in good time dear," she replied as she hurried Mary to a dressing area.
1111112211221221.title: Middle aged and confused

11111122112212212.content:
She escorted Mary to a seat and then went through a closet and started picking out clothes.

She came back and handed them to Mary, and then before Mary had a chance to speak she pushed her into a dressing room.

"These seem a bit racy for the age I am now," she hollered out.

"Nonsense, you just need to let go of the ideas you have about older women's fashions."

"Then we aren't going for an age-appropriate look?"

"We are being daring my dear, and saying it is okay for an older woman to be sexy, wild and free!"

"Okay, if you say so," she murmered and proceeded to get changed.

Moments later, she emerged from the dressing room dressed in dark gray mini skirt that came to mid thigh (if that), a teal blue silk top, a short gray jacket, and a

multi-colored scarf in blues, grays, reds, and white. Soft gray curls dangled down one side of her face, as she brushed her hair out of her eyes.

She also sported a pair of teal blue pumps as well.

Before she had time to think she was escorted to...
11111122112212212.title: Mary gets a wild and sexy outfit for someone mu...

1111112211221222.content:
"Mary, Mary?"

She stirred again, meeting the gaze of Mr. Wise and Vincent.

"Wha-what happened?"

"You passed out, and hit your head on the floor. Are you okay?"

Vincent's words comforted her in a strange way. So it had all been a dream... What a nightmare! She'd almost turned old! Well, older than she'd hoped... But something made her really scared because of it; a little more on edge. Today, she'd grown more than over the most of her existence! Plus, she'd been confused for someone older by Vincent... She felt older, too. Wasn't she, even a little bit?

When her eyes met Vincent's again, Mary hobbled back up. He supported her on one side, while Wise handled the other. She felt as if she was some sort of princess, being carried around practically. As they reached the elevator, Mr. Wise abruptly broke from the group, off to do more "business". Mary didn't complain. After all, Wise was a very busy man...

So, she and Vincent rode up in the elevator, alone. (Gulp!) The tension strained poor Mary...
1111112211221222.title: Blackout

choices: The floor was a photographer's studio, without the photographer!
11111122112212221.content:
Well, unfortunately Vincent had to split on the ride up, but Mary made it to her floor without any more distractions... What a weird guy, huh?

Once Mary reached her floor, she noticed something strange...
11111122112212221.title: Mary's Short Sigh of Relief

111111221122122211.content:
Mary looked around to find the interior a plush loft apartment, right here on the 17th floor!! What in the world was going on? Mary carefully traced over the soft cushions, ambled around the leopard print rug, and ogled the gaudy, yet gorgeous, chandelier. A conference room for the extremely rich? Or could somebody actually be LIVING here?

"Yes, in fact, someone is..."
111111221122122211.title: A Luxurious Apartment...

1111112211221222112.content:
The woman's voice rose thick and heady above Mary's ears, and before she could turn around, the woman silenced her. The room grew dizzy, and Mary slumped into a chair. The woman laughed.

"New girl, huh? Lost on your way to the 17th floor?"

"This... is the 17th floor... Right?"

The woman cocked her finger from side to side; Mary experienced a deja vu feeling... Where had she seen this person before? If only her eyes weren't drifting out of focus...

"Silly girl, you must have taken the wrong elevator..."

"I took the same one as... Mr. Doxon..."

"Doxon? That prick?"

"Vincent Doxon..."

"Vincent?"

The woman looked Mary deep in the eyes, and then a smile creeped along her face. Mary's conciousness began to flicker...

"Vincent, Vincent... So nice to know you've returned... I'm sorry, dear girl, you're going to have to stay here for the time being."

With that, Mary passed out. The last thing she heard was the woman's footsteps...
1111112211221222112.title: The Woman

11111122112212221121.content: Awake, again. Mary stood up, and found herself...
11111122112212221121.title: The Girl

111111221122122211211.content:
"Good morning... Or should I say good evening, darling?"

Mary awoke to the sight of the woman again; she was obscured by a large panel of frosted glass. And yet, Mary swore she could still see the red of her lipstick from behind the pane...

"What's going on here?"

"What's going on? Quite nothing, m'dear. You've had your nice little nap, I've had my nice little chat. Let's continue where we started in my room..."

"Hey!! What do you mean? WHO ARE YOU?"

Mary was restrained by her arms, but found her legs unrestricted. She kicked off her high heeled shoe towards the glass! The stiletto pierced through the glass like paper, and the pane shattered into a million pieces...

The woman smiled. Mary awed at the face she had not recognized earlier...

"You're... You're Tantella Morsa! The famous model who works for the Agency!!"

"You're correct..."

"I... I'm your biggest fan!!"

"Oh, child, flattery will get you nowhere!"

It was then Mary remembered she was chained up... To something. Maybe even the wall. Why in the world would a famous model be after her?
111111221122122211211.title: A Role Model

111111222.content:
Mary completely examined the car, which was beautiful and astonishingly gorgeous. She picked up a little note in the compartment, which read, "A Token of our Thanks, the Agency."

She almost pinched herself, to make sure she wasn't dreaming! It was almost the best day ever! She felt like jumping around like the people who win the lottery, but it seemed a little too stupid for the occasion. Needless to say, Mary jumped in her souped-up car, and sped off towards the Agency.

When she got there, she didn't even need to ask the receptionist where to go anymore. It seems she'd already guessed at Mary's arrival, and pointed her finger towards the conference hall, as usual. Wise met her up in the hall. He was aghast!

"What is that... thing?"

He grimaced at the jacket, and Mary flushed.

"It's my brother's jacket..."

"Well, why in the world are you wearing his jacket?"

Mary knew it would come out sooner or later, so she unzipped the jacket to show Wise. His jaw dropped for half a second, and then he regained his composure.

"I see, well... For some reason, Mr. Doxon has told me to give you this jacket."

Wise handed Mary the most beautiful jacket she'd ever seen before! She muffled herself before she squealed with delight, and wore it with pride. Wise easily took away the ugly hoodie, assuring her she'd get it back at the end of the day.

Mary entered the conference room.
111111222.title: A Token of Our Thanks

1111112221.content:
"So, Mary, Mary, what do we have here?"

Ah, the seductive voice of Mr. Doxon. She was in heaven again...

"I'm going to assume you like the jacket?"

Mary nodded stupidly, and then pinched herself. What in the world was she doing?

"Oh, good, good. Then, I'm sure you'll be ready to get to work today, right?"

Again, Mary nodded, acting completely out of character. She hoped he thought it was endearing, and cute.

"Okay, then. I hope you don't mind being left in the hands of these two kind ladies, do you?"

Mary again began to nod, noticing the two women walk into the room. Both of them looked like twins, except one was ebony-haired; one was blonde. Both of them were extremely beautiful, and made Mary super jealous. Doxon waved goodbye, and the two women took Mary away.

"Hi there, sweetie~~! I'm Ida," the black-haired woman said.

"I'm Maria," the blonde retorted.

"We hope you'll like your speed training session," they giggled in unison!

Something about their laughter felt really fake and metallic to Mary, but, oh well!
1111112221.title: Mystery Agenda

choices: one of the impossibly beautiful ones.
a frumpy geek, why was she here anyways?
11112.content:
Mary got behind the wheel of her own, beat-up dirty car in the rush to work. She knew it would probably look bad on her reputation to bring such a scummy car to such a high-scale place of business, but right now image wasn't a matter. And yet, Mary sat in the car with one of her most expensive, and tight, outfits on. She was dressed to impress, obviously, so she hoped it might take a bit of the edge off of her nasty old car. Doxon's words suddenly came back to her...

"Please wear baggy clothes."

Did it matter? She was now really worried. Because, should it matter, Mary would be in an even worse position! Nearly late, in a ratty car, and forgetting her new boss's specific instructions? Mary wanted to slump her head, but right now she had more important issues: keeping on the road!

Luckily, Mary found her way again without any trouble, and managed to get to the building at exactly 9:31. She could already imagine her new boss yelling at her, probably worse than the chew-out Wise, his assistant, had gotten yesterday. She quietly worked her way into the conference room, as per her new schedule, for the meeting with all the new employees.

Wise found her outside the room, and ushered her in with exasperation. She hoped, for Heaven's sake, they weren't waiting on her.

They weren't.

Mary found herself surrounded by people she'd never seen before, but all of them were gorgeous, beautiful. Well, most of them. There were a few people Mary wondered if she should even be in the same room as, for they had to be applying for something other than modeling! She kept her laughs to herself, and attentively looked towards the front of the room after sitting down.

Doxon walked in onto a platform, and spoke into a microphone.

"Greetings, new employees!"

Mary was still bedazzled by that smile of his. 'Focus,' she reminded herself with a little slap on her leg.

"Today, for most of you, is your first day in employment under the Agency's name. We thank you, for arriving on time, dressing appropriately, not fidgeting."

He looked Mary right in the eye; he'd caught her right in the act of slapping herself back on task. Doxon raised an eyebrow. Mary gave a nervous giggle, and shyed away after seeing everyone else glaring at her.

"Now, if you please, you've been assigned a section to go to. Please look at the tickets my assistant, Mr. Wise, gave you at the door."

Mary sat confused for a second, and then noticed a piece of paper laying between her fingers. She pulled it up to her face to read it.

"Longfield, MARY. Room 15-7, Floor 17."

"This is your temporary pass card. Don't lose it, please, ladies. Wise will organize you into groups, and the representatives of each group will come and take you to the appropriate floor and room number. And so, I bid you farewell, and good luck!"

Mary watched Doxon walk away- Wow, he looked amazing today. She took another quick peek at her ticket, and gulped. It was a long way up to floor 17...

Just out of the corner of her eye, Mary caught a glance of someone coming up to her. Mary couldn't exactly see, but the mystery girl looked like...
11112.title: Greetings, New Employees!

111121.content:
Mary awaited the model, but sadly was mistaken. The model had found her real friend and didn't even give Mary another glance. Her spirits drooped, but what could you expect anyways?

Wise reentered the room a second later, holding up a cue card for "Room 15-7, Floor 17". Mary slumped over towards Wise, but glanced behind and noticed the rest of her group were the elites! Mary hardly could breathe; she was one of the gorgeous ones! Wise escorted them into the elevator, as the 10 of them easily fit (including Wise).

No one spoke a word as they entered Room 15-7. Mary noticed the typical signs of a clinic, and then the doctor arrived, a forty-something Chinese woman.

"Hi, my name is Dr. Chin, but you can call me Norma. They all do."

This woman giggled too much, from what Mary could already tell, she didn't like the type.
111121.title: Trashin' Fashion (Part 1)

choices: She took the change of clothes.
1111211.content:
Norma began to show the girls into an adjoining room, which had at least 10 private stalls and a control room in back separated by a glass window. Mary had an idea of what was coming.

"Here is where we offer our new models the free, company required cleansing. These custom built stalls work a little like showers, but please don't confuse them for one!"

Norma laughed at her stupid joke, which none of the girls, or Mary, thought was funny. Huh.

"Please sit down your own stall, and no pushing, please. Once you are seated, please tie up your hair or clip it back, keeping hair out of the face and away from your neck. There will be a pair of opaque goggles next to you, please don them with haste. And once you are in the stall, please do not leave for any reason. It would be a good idea to go to the bathroom now if you must."

At that, nobody decided to go, so Norma nervously began ushering in the girls. A relatively young looking "pretty", the same from before, was speaking to Norma. The girl seemed distressed, but weren't they all? Mary decided to go and sit in her stall, bored. Before she even made a step, Norma stopped her.

"Are you sure you're completely ready?"

"Why wouldn't I be?"

"Well, this process takes a while, and you might want to consider something a bit more... comfortable."

"Huh?"

Norma made a gesture to her clothes. Mary laughed.

"Um, Ms. Norma?"

"Oh, sweetie, I'm sure this girl can answer your question here. I've got to get to the control room... By the by, should you make the decision to change, you'll find spare clothes in the bathrooms."

The girl turned to Mary, who groaned. Hearing such, the girl's pretty eyes squeezed up with tears, and then Mary turned a sympathetic eye.

"Hey, hey. It's okay. I'm sorry. I'm Mary."

"Evangeline."

The young girl Evangeline still wept, and Mary wandered off highly confused. But, the question is, did Mary follow Norma's advice, or simply wear her own clothes?
1111211.title: Trashin' Fashion (Part 2)

11112111.content:
Mary took Norma's offer; she thought it might be good to have such clothes! Fate had given her a second chance to make right her former mistake; Mary took notice. To her, it seemed the world would suit to her needs, no matter what! Apparently, some of the others had also agreed with changing clothes. In the end, it was the same no matter what they wore, right?

The moment Mary shut the door to her stall, the entire thing sealed off completely airtight. Luckily, Mary could still hear, and the oxygen wasn't thin, but something felt extremely fishy about the whole affair... Mary tried to jostle the door, but it must have been pressure locked- not an inch's budge. So, the only thing left to do was sit, and worry...

Mary heard Norma's voice over an intercom, announcing to the girls that the process would now begin. Mary was highly confused, but Norma's tone sounded so calming. When sleep tried to wander into Mary's eyes, she forced them open wide, and struggled to stay awake. From the outside, she could hear the screams of the other girls, muffled by the pods' barrier. But, nevertheless, Mary was determined to stay strong. After all, they wouldn't just kill innocent girls for no reason, right?

Mary looked up, and from the only hole in the pod, a strange pink colored gas discharged throughout her pod. Thinking it was a sleeping agent, Mary tried to stop up the hole. However, that only made the transformation begin faster...
11112111.title: Trashin' Fashion (Part 3)

choices: Fiddle with the controls and try to change back.
111121111.content:
The changes floated through her slowly like venom. First, Mary's hair coiled up in greasy knots and turned a hideous disfigured form of her old platinum color. She could feel every pimple boiling up on her face as if her skin had turned to molten acid. Luckily, she kept her vision clean. Uneasiness settled in again as Mary's lips turned to crinkled plastic wrap, and she only got worse.

Her neck shortened, and she could see the starts of a nasty double chin. Luckily, the baggy clothes hid from Mary's view the thing she feared most. In mere seconds, Mary lost all womanly dignity worked for these 17 long years. Now, at least, she didn't have to suffer through her old shirt becoming completely unwearable before her eyes!

Mary watched in horror as even more gas poured out of the tanker. She lost the tone of years trying to stay supremely skinny, and the news didn't lighten up as the transformation broadened her once non-existent hips. As Mary refused to look in the mirror in front of her, she couldn't help but imagine the gruesome process she experienced throughout her body.

Now, the transformation took a turn for the worst, as Mary started to shrink farther and farther away from the pod's ceiling. She cried tears of pure sadness; it had taken her whole life to reach 5' 5", and now she barely reached the fifth foot. Mary's whining seemed to be useful for one thing - Norma told the girls they could now leave the pods. The doors' locks simultaneously unhinged, and Mary pushed out her door. She tried to make an exit, but mobbed by the other girls, who had become even uglier than she, Mary couldn't spot the door she came in.

"Girls, girls! Calm down!"

Norma desperately attempted to overpower the gripes of the girls! The mob of transformed uglies wouldn't shut up! To silence them, Norma pressed a button! A piercing buzz filled the girl's ears as Norma safely wore headphones. So, the now silent room filled with Norma's instructions.

"This has been your only official task for the day, but Mr. Doxon requests that you girls find rooms here in the building. It's not like your nasty little faces can go back home any time soon!"

Norma's once cheery little laugh became a hag-like cackle, and the sheepish girls sobbed under her terrible reign. Mary focused upon other things, desperate to not become completely lost and under Norma's control.

"So, single-file, please, and follow me out. If you're lucky, we'll offer you a couple of meals!"

None of the girls understood what they must do, so they followed Norma because they lacked otherwise. Left alone in the other room were Mary and a strangely tiny girl...

"Hello? Are you okay?"

"Do I LOOK OKAY?!"

The small face peeked up from behind hands, and Mary recognized it as Evangeline, the worried little princess from before.

"Evangeline? It's me, Mary."

"M-mary?"

Evangeline cried harder as Mary tried to comfort her.

"I've got to get home, Mary. I can't stay here. Not with that witch around... Please, you have to help me! You can drive, right?"

Evangeline's sorrowful eyes struck a cord in Mary's heart. She had to help the girl, but Norma would be coming back soon... What should she do?
111121111.title: The Trans-Reality Check

1111211112.content:
Mary managed to sneak on past the devil-woman, with Evangeline safely in tow...

Outside, Mary paused.

"They'll notice if my car is gone, won't they?"

Evangeline spun around.

"Why don't we take mine?"

She waved towards a luxurious black Mercedes, just sitting there in the sun.

"Why didn't you just go home yourself?"

"W-well, I... I..."

She began to sob profusely, and Mary quickly ran up to hush her.

"Shhhh!! It's okay."

"I can't drive, Mary..."

Mary's heartstrings tugged a little bit. The poor girl couldn't even drive! What was she doing here? Mary glanced up towards the broad windows of the Agency, and then brushed herself and Evangeline into the nice Mercedes. Perhaps she could just call one of her friends to pick up the car...

They drove on for miles, and reached a thicket of trees. Evangeline assured Mary that her house was now only a few miles away, and Mary gave out a glad sigh. Something in her envisioned Evangeline as a little rich girl; the long road supported that idea. What had made that girl go into the city to get a job? Evangeline motioned towards the right, and Mary turned into the suberbly hidden driveway. The house that met her eyes paralleled the beauty that Evangeline had once exuded. Now, it seemed to mock the poor girl.

"I'll be stopping here, Mary. Thank you, for driving me home..."

Mary then realized the biggest problem. She couldn't get home, because that car belonged to Evangeline... Wait, how?

"Evangeline, I can't get home. This car is yours."

"No, it's yours."

"What?"

"Mary, you can keep it."

"Who drove it there?"

"My other chauffeur, who quit. He took the taxi to his home, and now it's yours."

Mary's bewilderment wouldn't cease! What had made the previous owner quit? She was really confused...

"But, if you're worried about it, you could come inside while I find you an appropriate ride home. I mean, of course you shouldn't just take gifts from strangers, right?"

Evangeline's words were true; but Mary would be expected at home...
1111211112.title: The Unlikely Chauffeur

11112112.content:
Mary snubbed off Norma's offer; she had no need of such clothes! Even though fate had given her a second chance to make right her former mistake, Mary hadn't taken notice. To her, the world would suit to her needs, no matter what. Apparently, some of the others had also rejected changing clothes. In the end, it was the same no matter what they wore, right?

The moment Mary shut the door to her stall, the entire thing sealed off completely airtight. Luckily, Mary could still hear, and the oxygen wasn't thin, but something felt extremely fishy about the whole affair... Mary tried to jostle the door, but it must have been pressure locked- not an inch's budge. So, the only thing left to do was sit, and worry...

Mary heard Norma's voice over an intercom, announcing to the girls that the process would now begin. Mary was highly confused, but Norma's tone sounded so calming. When sleep tried to wander into Mary's eyes, she forced them open wide, and struggled to stay awake. From the outside, she could hear the screams of the other girls, muffled by the pods' barrier. But, nevertheless, Mary was determined to stay strong. After all, they wouldn't just kill innocent girls for no reason, right?

Mary looked up, and from the only hole in the pod, a strange pink colored gas discharged throughout her pod. Thinking it was a sleeping agent, Mary tried to stop up the hole. However, that only made the transformation begin faster...
11112112.title: Trashin' Fashion (Part 3)

111121121.content:
The changes floated through her slowly like venom. First, Mary's hair coiled up in greasy knots and turned a hideous disfigured form of her old platinum color. She could feel every pimple boiling up on her face as if her skin had turned to molten acid. Luckily, she kept her vision clean. Uneasiness settled in again as Mary's lips turned to crinkled plastic wrap, and she only got worse.

Her neck shortened, and she could see the starts of a nasty double chin. Luckily, the baggy clothes hid from Mary's view the thing she feared most. In mere seconds, Mary lost all womanly dignity worked for these 17 long years. Her shirt drooped like her spirits, and Mary, in earnest, tried to hold it up.

Mary watched in horror as even more gas poured out of the tanker. She lost the tone of years trying to stay supremely skinny, and the news didn't lighten up as the transformation broadened her once non-existent hips. As Mary refused to look in the mirror in front of her, she couldn't help but imagine the gruesome process she experienced throughout her body.

Now, the transformation took a turn for the worst, as Mary started to shrink farther and farther away from the pod's ceiling. She cried tears of pure sadness; it had taken her whole life to reach 5' 5", and now she barely reached the fifth foot. Mary's whining seemed to be useful for one thing - Norma told the girls they could now leave the pods. The doors' locks simultaneously unhinged, and Mary pushed out her door. She tried to make an exit, but mobbed by the other girls, who had become even uglier than she, Mary couldn't spot the door she came in.

"Girls, girls! Calm down!"

Norma desperately attempted to overpower the gripes of the girls! The mob of transformed uglies wouldn't shut up! To silence them, Norma pressed a button! A piercing buzz filled the girl's ears as Norma safely wore headphones. So, the now silent room filled with Norma's instructions.

"This has been your only official task for the day, but Mr. Doxon requests that you girls find rooms here in the building. It's not like your nasty little faces can go back home any time soon!"

Norma's once cheery little laugh became a hag-like cackle, and the sheepish girls sobbed under her terrible reign. Mary focused upon other things, desperate to not become completely lost and under Norma's control.

"So, single-file, please, and follow me out. If you're lucky, we'll offer you a couple of meals!"

None of the girls understood what they must do, so they followed Norma because they lacked otherwise. Left alone in the other room were Mary and a strangely tiny girl...

"Hello? Are you okay?"

"Do I LOOK OKAY?!"

The small face peeked up from behind hands, and Mary recognized it as Evangeline, the worried little princess from before.

"Evangeline? It's me, Mary."

"M-mary?"

Evangeline cried harder as Mary tried to comfort her.

"I've got to get home, Mary. I can't stay here. Not with that witch around... Please, you have to help me! You can drive, right?"

Evangeline's sorrowful eyes struck a cord in Mary's heart. She had to help the girl, but Norma would be coming back soon... What should she do?
111121121.title: The Trans-Reality Check

111122.content:
Mary groaned to see the overly friendly girl running towards her. She could only fear the worst...

"Hi, I'm Darcy Daye! And I was wondering if we had the same room. I mean, I've been asking everyone, but..."

Mary zoned out as the boring girl droned on and on about it. Even now, she couldn't believe someone like this had gotten through Doxon's rigorous process. She was half-tempted to tell the girl that she was in the wrong room, just to be rid of her. But, Mary knew that if she said that, it was all downhill. So, she let the girl prattle endlessly; it was all she could do.

At last, Wise came back into the room and held up a cue card, which read "Room 15-7, Floor 17". Mary knew it was hers, and quickly headed over into the line. Her fellow members of room 15-7, however, weren't the greatest of picks. In fact, each one of the girls was horrendously hideous, and Mary interally shriveled to imagine herself even in the same group as these ugly girls. But, she sighed in submission: the job was more important. All of the gross girls and Mary boarded the elevator (after all, there were only 7 or 8 of them, excluding Wise) and rode all the way up to floor 17. Mary was squeamish around heights, but she feared showing any signs of weakness would flock the geeks to her.

When at last the girls reached the top floor, Mary felt a very unknown finger prod her shoulder. She had the oddest premonition it was someone she hadn't wished was in her room...

"Oh, it's you! Yay! I'm so glad. You remember me, right, Darcy, from downstairs! I'm so happy we have the same room! That must mean we'll be..."

Darcy gasped like a complete idiot.

"modeling together!"

Darcy did a little leap of joy, and Mary groaned. Just then, Wise began to push the girls into a room of complete white, where a grinning Chinese woman met them.

"Hi, girls. My name is Dr. Chin, but please call me Norma, they all do."

This woman had a giggling problem, and was always smiling. Mary gave her the once-over, and knew her over-eager type. This was going to be interesting...
111122.title: From Frumpy to Fabulous (Part 1)

choices: She followed Norma's advice, why shouldn't she?
"I'll wear my own clothes, thank you."
1111221.content:
Norma began to show the girls into an adjoining room, which had at least 10 private stalls and a control room in back separated by a glass window. Mary had an idea of what was coming.

"Here is where we offer our new models the free, company required cleansing. These custom built stalls work a little like showers, but please don't confuse them for one!"

Norma laughed at her stupid joke, which must have been effective because the other frumpy girls began to laugh to. The awkward group made Mary extremely uncomfortable.

"Please sit down your own stall, and no pushing, please. Once you are seated, please tie up your hair or clip it back, keeping hair out of the face and away from your neck. There will be a pair of opaque goggles next to you, please don them with haste. And once you are in the stall, please do not leave for any reason. It would be a good idea to go to the bathroom now if you must."

At that, at least 5 of the girls made a rush for the bathroom door, and Mary was left alone with Darcy and Norma. Darcy was already giggling and laughing with the older woman, and Mary decided to go and sit in her stall. But before she even made a step, Norma stopped her.

"Are you sure you're completely ready?"

"Why wouldn't I be?"

"Well, this process takes a while, and you might want to consider something a bit more comfortable."

"Huh?"

Norma made a gesture to her clothes. Mary laughed.

But, the question is, did Mary follow Norma's advice, or simply wear her own clothes?
1111221.title: From Frumpy to Fabulous (Part 2)

11112211.content:
Mary took Norma's offer; she thought it might be good to have such clothes! Fate had given her a second chance to make right her former mistake; Mary took notice. To her, it seemed the world would suit to her needs, no matter what! Apparently, some of the others had also agreed with changing clothes. In the end, it was the same no matter what they wore, right?

The moment Mary shut the door to her stall, the entire thing sealed off completely airtight. Luckily, Mary could still hear, and the oxygen wasn't thin, but something felt extremely fishy about the whole affair... Mary tried to jostle the door, but it must have been pressure locked- not an inch's budge. So, the only thing left to do was sit, and worry...

Mary heard Norma's voice over an intercom, announcing to the girls that the process would now begin. Mary was highly confused, but Norma's tone sounded so calming. When sleep tried to wander into Mary's eyes, she forced them open wide, and struggled to stay awake. From the outside, she could hear the screams of the other girls, muffled by the pods' barrier. But, nevertheless, Mary was determined to stay strong. After all, they wouldn't just kill innocent girls for no reason, right?

Mary looked up, and from the only hole in the pod, a strange pink colored gas discharged throughout her pod. Thinking it was a sleeping agent, Mary tried to stop up the hole. However, that only made the transformation begin faster...
11112211.title: From Frumpy to Fabulous (Part 3)

choices: I'll stick with the group, she's lost it.
111122111.content:
Mary noticed the beginnings of her transformation on her arms, closest in contact to the gas. They became even more slender, and her horrible sunburn from the week before all but disappeared into an even tone. Her hair plumed out from the sides, and the platinum color washed out like rain as Mary's natural golden brunette returned. As she looked across from her, Mary noticed the full length mirror in the pod for the first time.

Mary watched in complete awe as her awful acne disappeared and her complexion became utter perfection. To compare, imagine airbrushing, on a live scale. Mary's face lost any flaws, and for the first time she saw a truly beautiful her. The changes continued on, going down from her head. Her neck lengthened a bit, and her shoulders creeped in a little. Mary's biggest shock was when her new "assets" came in. The onset came by complete surprize, and Mary envisaged the next step. The fabric of the loose T-shirt stretched and stretched, but not a single tear. Fortunately, she had listened to Norma!

The changes delved down further as Mary noticed her elongating waist. It had always been abnormally short, but now it had reached a beauteous height. Mary sprinkled herself in the misting fog now; it brought insane euphoria upon her! Mary noticed the tip of her nose stretching to mere centimeters of the blast hole now, as her legs rocketed her up to probably near 6 feet.

Mary thought to herself, "I'm really going to be a model!"

When Mary's nose got close enough to the emitter, she took in a full deep breath of it. The scent drove her nearly mad, and she began to giggle! The feeling of it flying through her nose felt so ticklish, and then she began to feel ticklish all over as final, subtle changes panned out. Mary thought she was going to pass out...

At last, Norma gave the all clear, and the doors unlocked and opened. Mary stepped out, and for the first time ever had to duck her head. Back in the room, she stared at the other girls exiting the stalls. Each of them looked like cutouts from magazines! Just like she did! Mary wanted to twirl around with joy, only stopping herself because of the now crowded hallway space. Luckily, Norma began to round up the girls in yet another room.

Each of the newly beautiful girls gazed upon each other with wide eyed amazement, and Mary couldn't help but eyeball everyone, too.

"Omigosh, is that you, Mary?"

Mary turned to see a strangely familiar face... The boring girl! She now contested Mary as the more stunning. Her hair had grown silky and she noticed the glorious red twinges. Mary felt a little ashamed as Darcy had quite beaten her out on the chest department. The two of them now talked freely, social boundaries had been crossed with ease in their model forms.

"Now, girls, I know this might take a little getting used to, but we really need to get out to the lot. If you'll follow me, please..."

Norma walked off and each girl followed like a duckling.

"Do you really wanna go, Mary? 'Cuz I've got some ideas, too."

Darcy sure sounded a lot more rebellious now that she'd lost her nerdy exterior. Should Mary follow Darcy's new plan, or stick with the group?
111122111.title: The Sudden Transformation!

1111221111.content:
Mary wasn't one to be called a chicken, so she took up Darcy's offer. Darting their eyes around, waiting for the right opportunity to escape, it was all so thrilling! Mary hadn't felt this excited before!

"Come on, Mary, let's take the stairs!"

Mary tiptoed away with Darcy to the staircase, and then the two of them sprinted down the flights. At long last, they reached the bottom floor, laughing with sheer delight! How awesome today was! First, Mary gets turned into a model, second, she's going out to party! And finally, she doesn't have to attend that boring, long photo shoot! God, what a joy!

"Mary, c'mon slowpoke! They're gonna catch us if you don't hurry it up!"

Darcy was already halfway through the door when Mary looked up again. Stifling her laughter, Mary hurried out the door with Darcy, and they were finally free!!

"So now what to do?"

"I have a few ideas..."
1111221111.title: Red-Headed Devil

choices: Follow Darcy, I have to save her!
1111221112.content:
"Uhm, she did say we were going to the photo shoot, right? That's part of our job, Darcy! Who knows what they could do to us if we run away? I personally don't want to think about it!!"

"Gosh, what a chicken, Mary. I'll catch you later..."

"Wait, Darcy!!"

Darcy walked out of sight into the stairwell, and Mary feared for the worst! Who knows what kind of danger Darcy would find out there? And what would happen to her if she was caught? Mary couldn't make her mind up again... What should she do??
1111221112.title: Think Before You Act
