1553322.content: Aabirah's a college student right now but what sort of a part time job could she take to support herself.
1553322.title: Aabirah bint Aabzaari (19)

15533222.content: will this be Aabirah's job or should it be something else?
15533222.title: helping women in prenatal care or something else?

choices: She begins to wish she was pregnant
155332221.content:
Aabirah was both nervous and excited to begin her new job at Helping Hearts Prenatal clinic. It was her first job out of high school and an excellent way to spend her summer between semesters. It sounded fun, helping pregnant mothers and their unborn babies. She was so excited!

What could go wrong?

"And there you are, Aabirah!" her new manager, Gretchen, greeted her on her way in. "Excited to start the day?"

"I sure am, ma'am," she replied. "Just a bit nervous..."

"Of course! I know I was nervous my first couple of weeks here too, but it didn't take long for me to feel right at home.

Helping Hearts Prenatal Clinic was a modest, nine-story grey building. Despite its austere outer grey concrete walls, inside was light and airy. Already, Aabirah could see all sorts of pregnant women and their nurses going about their day. She was surprised to see so many nurses also pregnant, but didn't think much of it.

Does something begin to happen to Aabirah?
155332221.title: The prenatal nurse

choices: Aabirah feels tired and needs a nap
1553322212.content:
Suddenly, Aabirah felt sick. It came on quick and she couldn’t help but put her hand to her mouth.

“Umm, Gretchen?”

“Yes, sweetly?”

“Bathroom!”

“Oh, right over there-“

And she was off so fast that she didn’t notice the pleased look in Gretchen’s eyes.

Aabirah’s left just as quickly as it began. She hadn’t had a very big breakfast, so there wasn’t much to throw up, though she was left feeling quite tired. What had it been? Nerves? Stress? A stomach bug? And embarrassing for it to happen with her her boss right there!

Not that Gretchen seemed upset when she returned. In fact, her manager seemed oddly cheerful.

“First day jitters?”

“Apparently, but I’m so sorry!”

“No need to apologize! Do you need anything before we begin our tour?”

Does she?
1553322212.title: She begins to feel nauseous

15533222121.content:
What is our poor girl craving?

Option 1) Pickles and ice cream, a classic snack for expectant ladies

Option 2) Hot Cheetos and Mountain Dew, for the very young mother. She begins to regress and act like a teenager.

Option 3) Whipped cream and bananas. Aabirah begins to act like a pregnant slut.
15533222121.title: She gets a weird craving

choices: First floor, the one they’re on now. Month 1
155332221211.content:
“I guess I haven’t really ate today, but it’s the weirdest thing...do you guys have any pickles and ice cream?”

“Sweety, this is a hospital for pregnant ladies. Of course we do!”

“But I’m not-“

“Just wait here while I get you your snack. It’ll just be a moment.”

Aabirah nodded, suddenly a little confused. Yes, she wanted a weird snack, but that didn’t mean she was pregnant. She just wanted pickles and ice cream.

But soon Gretchen returned, ice cream and pickle in hand.

“Here you are, bon appetite!”

“T-Thanks...and the tour..?”

“Yes, the tour! Let’s start on the...”

1553322212112.content:
“The third floor, I think,” Gretchen said. “That floor is my favorite! It’s where we take ultrasounds.”

Aabirah nodded, her mouth full of the creamy ice cream and tangy pickles.

“We’ll take the elevator. Right this way. How do you like your ice cream?”

“Oh, it’s-brrrg!”

She hadn’t meant to burp so loudly and quickly covered her mouth.

“Excuse me! I’m so sorry, I-“

“Shhh, it happens, dear. Now, here’s our lift, right this way,” Gretchen said with a smile as she guided Aabirah onto the elevator. Poor Aabirah smiled sheepishly, still feeling embarrassed. She was messing up left and right! What was wrong with her?

What was wrong with her was becoming more apparent as her flat belly begant to get...bigger. Does she notice?
1553322212112.title: The third floor, month 3

choices: She puts Aabirah into a trance
15533222121122.content:
Aabirah was on the slowest elevator in the world. By the time they were on Floor 2, she had finished her ice cream and was back to feeling queasy. Gretchen didn’t seem worried, though, and she said not a word, just smiled as the elevator made its way up.

Aarbirah tried to smile too, but found it difficult when not only did she feel like she could throw up, but her stomach also felt oddly...itchy.

She couldn’t help it, she had to scratch, but then, something felt odd.

“What the..?”

She couldn’t help it. Her stomach was curved slightly outward, as though she had had a very large meal. But she hadn’t, just the ice cream!

“G-Gretchen?”

“Yes? Is everything alright?”

“I-I think my stomach-Oh my God! I think it’s getting bigger! No! W-What is happening?”

What does Gretchen do?
15533222121122.title: Yes and she begins to freak out

choices: Get Aaibrah into a different outfit
155332221211221.content:
Gretchen sighed.

"Now Aabirah-"

"Something is wrong! I-I-"

"Aabirah, listen to me. You're panicking, just breath."

"B-But-!"

"Breath, just breath, that's a girl. Exhale, inhale, exhale, inhale. That's a good girl."

Aabirah did as she was told and breathed, slowly in and slowly out.

"Just relax, Aabirah. Relax and don't worry. Your belly is perfectly fine. Nothing is odd about it."

Aabirah nodded. She felt herself agree to it. There was nothing weird about her belly.

"You're just nervous about your new job, dear. Just very nervous. That's perfectly normal, isn't it? Relax and feel at peace with your body."

Yes, at peace...she was just nervous about her new job...

And suddenly they were at the third floor.

Aabirah felt relaxed and at peace.

What do they do now?
155332221211221.title: She puts Aabirah into a trance

1553322212112211.content:
“You’re going to really like this next part, Aabirah.”

Poor Aabirah nodded, still feeling a little drowsy after the long elevator ride. She obediently followed Gretchen into one of the dark side rooms, not noticing the large bellies of most of the people she passed. In the room was a small examine table and ultrasound machine.

“Aabirah, I want you to get on the table.”

“But-“

“It’s just to help you understand how our patients feel, that’s all. It’s very important that you’re able to empathize with your patients and know what they’re going through. Now, get on the table and lift your shirt.”

She couldn’t exactly disagree with Gretchen’s logic. Though it was a little difficult, with Gretchen’s help she maneuvered herself up to the table and laid down. She lifted up her shirt for Gretchen to squeeze gel onto.

“That wasn’t so hard,” Gretchen said, ignoring Aarbirah’s shudder as she placed the wand onto her belly.

Does Aarbirah seen anything on the ultrasound screen?
1553322212112211.title: See the ultrasound tech

choices: Speak to some of the other nurses on this floor
15533222121122113.content:
“Aabirah, listen to my voice. You like my voice, remember? Just focus on my voice...”

And she did. It was nice to listen to Gretchne’s voice.

“Good girl, such a good girl, don’t focus on the screen. Everything is fine. Your belly is doing very well. You’re happy with your belly, Aabirah. You’re happy being here today...”

Soon, it felt as bough Aabirah was in a dose. And then it felt like she was dreaming. Such a weird dream, where she had a huge pregnant belly. She was dressed as a nurse, doing her rounds, but her belly was so big. But she didn’t mind when it got in the way or slowed her down. She was so happy...

She didn’t really remember waking up, but there she was, yawning as Gretchen helped her sit up.

She knew she should have felt ashamed for sleeping on her first day, but there she was, falling asleep. Not that Gretchen seemed to mind.

“Did you have a nice rest? It’s very nice to get sleepy during one of those. Here, let’s get ready and go to the...”
15533222121122113.title: Gretchen continues to hypnotize her

choices: Her belly grows to the seven month mark
155332221211221131.content:
Aabirah, still dazed and tired, obediently followed Gretchen to the elevator. Without a thought, she scratched her itchy belly and listened as Gretchen spoke about...something...

"...our delivery rooms are first rate...best ice cream..."

The words came and went as Aabirah followed her to the elevator.

"...worry...biggest...seven..."

Words, warm and cozy flower neatly into her head. And Aabirah couldn't find it in her to mind the weird feeling that overcame her as she entered the elevator with Gretchen. She felt suddenly winded, her belly hard.

What happens?
155332221211221131.title: 5th Floor

1553322212112211311.content:
"Aabirah? Aabirah?"

"Y-Yes...?"

Gretchen's voice sounded so far away.

"This elevator is very slow. It's a good chance for us to talk about your future."

Aabirah thought about her future, about being a nurse here, helping mothers and their babies...the thoughts made her feel warm and happy. She was able to ignore the weird feeling in her belly.

"You seem like such a lovely young lady. Such a beautiful face, good grades, good genes..."

Aabirah's smiled at the praise. Her belly felt so warm. She caressed it, unable to see that it was getting larger by the minute.

"I know you're going to be a wonderful nurse," Gretchen said.

"Thank you...I...I feel...Oh!"

She felt something strange.

"I...I feel odd."

What happened?

It felt like little butterflies in her belly.

"It's all fine, sweety," Gretchen said. "What does it feel like?"

"Just...fluttering..."

"Oh, you sweet girl, that is very normal. Let me."

Aabirah didn't want to stop Gretchen from touching her. Nor did she care that her shirt was now riding up her belly or that her pants were too tight.

"Oh, my, what a lively one! I knew you would be a success!" Gretchen didn't take her hand back. She rubbed circles in Aabirah's tightening flesh. "Tell me about your dreams, Aabirah. What do you want?"

"...to be a nurse...I want to be a nurse..."

"Is that all?"

She thought...

info.brief_description: Watch as people's lives are literaly changed forever due to their new job!
info.description:
Some simple rules for this interactive.

No Gender Switching
No Weight Gain
Swearing allowed

Please note, whichever job a character takes, what they transform into must relate to their job. For example, if you have the character working with babies, that person must continually get younger.
